correct_order: There is one thing that has been banned in NSW, companies, and individuals cannot get it from the wholesale.
Wholesalers have responsibilities to check if the customers have a license to get this thing.
Anyone who has been caught uses this thing will lose their jobs.
Unless license been getting or approved by the specific department.

sources: Anyone who has been caught uses this thing will lose their jobs.
